mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ADMIN, LOCKED, PASSWD, REALNAME, USERNAME, ROLEID, ROLENAME, DESCRIPTION, TELEPHONE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_user set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN = #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LOCKED = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PASSWD = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLEID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLENAME = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ADMIN, LOCKED, PASSWD, REALNAME, USERNAME, ROLEID, ROLENAME, DESCRIPTION, TELEPHONE from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ADMIN, LOCKED, PASSWD, REALNAME, USERNAME, ROLEID, ROLENAME, DESCRIPTION, TELEPHONE from t_user
